pages.text: You can create or join a party by using the /openpac-parties command. If tou want to manage your party settings press $(k:gui.xaero_pac_key_open_menu)

pages.title: Open Parties and Claims:
pages.text: This mod adds the ability to claim and to forceload world chunks, as well as create and manage player parties. It also gives server owners powerful controls over their players' usage of the mod's features.
